title: Virtual Parliament Special: How Will It Work?
itunes:title: Virtual Parliament Special: How Will It Work?
description:
MPs return to work on Tuesday, but things are going to look radically different. In this special episode, we look at how a virtual Parliament might work.

Dr Ruth Fox, director of the Hansard Society, explains to Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why having some MPs in the chamber and others on a video conference isn't the best way to hold the government to account.

But first, our UK government reporter Joe Mayes takes us through the government's latest announcements. Are we all going to be told to wear face masks? And does anyone actually know what the exit plan for the lockdown is?
